string.text: Hi, how are you?
How, how ... Eat all the time I want! Do you have something edible? No - sorry, I'm going to look. If only a stalker wandered ...
About Benito heard?
No, but who is it?
Yes there is one of our ... With Dr. skoreshilsya ... They say once ran ...
I do not know about this
Thompson did not see? He needed me.
But for the plant, he is hiding in the nooks. He's a strange ... Food was not looking for ... All these .. like them ... artifacts with a hauling ...
You, I look, brand new. Remember! These lively, to dolgovtsam the eyes do not get caught, very much they do not like us ... "Who loves us? .. Eh ...
How can you live here?
We like lepers. We have our own world. And we are not wanted.
Hi, a colleague, heh!
Both at-labeled with us! Went to the Bar naedem! Pull on living!
I have no time, their cases fully.
Nothing, there is so much meat ... And then only by scientists ... and then sit in a bunker. Okay, I'll go - there guys are already going.
Well, what's new news?
Then he settled near the controller, Chumakov itself is calling a very good headache and hangover cures.
What are you doing here?
Yes, we've got bored, even though the wolf howl, although the weather since the last release from the carousel hangar yesterday there appeared a couple Snorychey skated, and we can frolic ragged.
Hey! Can you?
Do not distract me
Thompson You?
Yes, it's me.
Sakharov said ...
Do not scare me ...
Do you have any artifacts? Answer, and then kill you.
Yes. But if you kill me, I get nothing. I can only sell them.
Naaaash¸l ... aaartefakt ...
Excellent. Now you fall asleep and wake up is a normal person.
Naaakonets something.
Pomooogii ... I...
I can see. In recent years, often have such faces to see.
Chtooo .. deeelat?
There is a way to help you. It can be done, but only if you provide artifact "Goldfish".
Where ... eeego ... find?
This artifact often appear after the release. It is possible that these rare artifacts is my ex-colleagues - Dr. Thompson.
Pooochemu ... byyyvshego?

Here at Yantar, in an underground laboratory, Dr. Thompson was faced with the controller. The controller was unable to completely subdue him, but many brain functions have stopped working. Now he's a zombie, but still thinks that the investigation continues. Walks on the most dangerous places. He most likely to be the "Goldfish".
Nnaaaéti ... artefaaa ... daaa ...
Prrooofessor ... pooomogite
Marked One as you once again managed? I hope you remember that to cure is necessary to obtain the artifact "Goldfish"?
Hull ... pooomnyuyu ... yeah ...
Watt ... onaaa ...
I immediately found a strange thing ...
What is it Marked One?
I have dealt with the crowd exploding zombies, and discovered among the remains of his hand. She glows, warms and it seems even protects from radiation ...

Marked One, do you find the hand of the legendary zombie suicide bomber? If so, it dramatically advance our research. We have not yet been any evidence of the existence of zombies. Only the ghost was telling me how they met them. But then I took it simply as a bike. You must immediately provide me with this artifact for research! .. About the price do not worry. If what you say is true, and my research confirms this - believe me, you will be rewarded ...
Well, I agree. Take it.
No, perhaps I'll save it for as long as himself.
Ok, Marked One ... Ride now, and I will spend a number of studies of this artifact.
Well.
Marked One, think carefully. After all, I suggest a good reward. If you still decide to help science - come back.
Well, how are advancing research arm of zombies?

Marked One, you're just in time! I just finished the study. This is just incredible! Unusual properties of the hands of the zombie is directly related to the impact of the anomaly is hot. Like other artifacts of this anomaly, the arm is able to protect from radiation ... But that's not all! It also has healing properties: displays the body of toxins and promotes tissue regeneration. Apparently, zombies kamikaze chrezychayno accelerated metabolism. Perhaps this can explain their ability to explode. Them, and so too unstable structure of the tissue, filled with sulfur dioxide and heated by an abnormal influence of frying, when damaged, simply explodes. But in a quiescent state, it accelerates the regeneration of ...
I wonder ... continue ...

Unlike other civil zombies are - living in a literal sense. Special structure of nerve cells suggests that these creatures are even capable of controlling the speed of their metabolism. They possess a kind of group intelligence - one sacrifice for sustenance of others. The only way to explain their suicidal tendencies. It's just incredible creatures. How much information could be obtained, if you catch a zombie alive! But I suspect that it is simply impossible, given their "explosive character". Now I throw off your PDA in their research, Marked One ...
This of course everything is fine ... Interesting information, all that ... But, I was expecting something, so to speak, more material from you get.

Oh yeah, almost forgot about your reward - so carried away by research ... Science is now funded poorly, so the money I give you a lot I can not. But I have a unique weapon - a modified sniper rifle, improvised explosive devices "Stormbreaker." With it, even a funny story - she got me a box of vodka. In Dolgovtsev, as always, there was a "leak" of new weapons. As a result, the rifle it fell into the hands of a lone stalker. Not so long ago, he wandered to us here at Amber. Was in terrible condition - hallucinations and behavioral problems. All the time repeated that vodka does not allow them to climb into his head. Who is "them" - is unclear ... A Professor Kruglov had just finished the distillation of alcohol ... em-m ... kl-hmm ... In general, he threw a stalker us all he had and grabbed a box of vodka and walked towards the army warehouses.
Yeah, funny story. And what's so special in this gun?

This rifle has a lightweight body, a larger store, enhanced zoom and built-in silencer. As a result, allows to deliver aimed fire at long distances with minimal impact. In general, the dream of every good shooter. Here, take ... and ammunition to her a couple of packs of ...
Yes, thank you. This gun is really useful to me.

hank you ... uh-uh ... Marked One, right? You helped my colleague Kruglov escape, and in gratitude, I would like to present you with our business suit ... Very handy thing, you know ... Maybe I could be something else for you?
I'm looking for a laboratory X-16. The bartender said that you may know her whereabouts

We have quite a long time interest Lab X-16 ... Rather, the device inside, which generates the radiation that directly impacts on people's minds. Have to disappoint you: there will not break without a special psy-defense. The result is certainly tragic, even if it can avoid the hordes of zombies around the entrance to the lab, you risk turning into one of them. All this is very serious. True, we have developed a device that helps to shield the radiation, but for a more fine-tuning is necessary to carry out a number of additional measurements. If you can help us do so, after a while we, perhaps, be able to provide for field trials finally align the prototype.
Measurements?
If you are together with our staff do all the necessary measurements, I am prepared to work a prototype of the protective device and give it to you. It probably will get into the lab.
Well, I agree.
Well, that's great! Talk to Kruglov and go. He has fused with everything you need.
Well.
Well, I agree.
Well, that's great! Talk to Semenov and go. All you need it already has
Well.
No ... while I would not want to take on this.
Sorry, sorry ... I do not know when we will be able to send an expedition to the measurements.
Yes? What are you interested?
I'm looking for a laboratory X-16. The bartender said that you may know her whereabouts.
Thank you, Spot, that has helped save Kruglov. Take this suit as a reward for his help. And, I suspect you're not just for the reward came, am I right?
I'm looking for a laboratory X-16. The bartender said that you may know her whereabouts.

We have been studying the radiation laboratory of X-16, you can not get through there without special protection. We have developed an appropriate device, but to configure it to produce a series of measurements. If you help us make these measurements, I'll let you set up a prototype, with which you can get into the lab.
Ñîãëàñåí.
Well, that's fine, talk to Kruglov and go. It has everything you need there.
No, not yet agree.
Very sorry. We are also unable to agree and send an expedition to the measurements.

Thank you... err... Marked One, right? You helped save our associate Kruglov and in order to show my sincere appreciation I would like to present you with one of our working suits. It comes in very handy, you should know that... Could I be of additional help to you?
I'm looking for Lab X16. The Barkeep told me you might have info about its location.

We've long had an interest in Lab X16...or, rather, in the mechanism inside it that generates emissions which directly affects people's consciousness. I'm afraid I have to disappoint you: the place is impossible to penetrate without special psi-armor. The outcome is known in advance - even if you could evade the swarms of zombies that infest the laboratory entrance, you run the risk of becoming one of them. This is all very serious. However, we've designed a screening device to help shield the emission, but to fine-tune it we have to obtain additional measurements. If you help us with this task, we could probably provide you with a fully calibrated prototype for field testing.
Measurements?

If you, together with our associate, take all the necessary measurements, I will prepare a fully workable prototype of the armor and will give it to you. It will most likely let you get inside the laboratory.
OK, I agree.
Excellent! Talk to Kruglov and get going. He is already equipped with the necessary gear.
OK.
OK, I agree.
Excellent! Talk to Semenov and get going. He's got everything you will need.
OK.
No.. right now I don't want to sign up for this.
That's too bad, a real pity... I don't know how or when we could carry out this measurement expedition on our own.
Yes, Sir? What might you be looking for?
I'm looking for Lab X16. The Barkeep told me you might have info about its location.
Thank you, Marked One, for rescuing Kruglov. Take this pressurized suit as a reward for your troubles. Also, I suspect you didn't come here for a simple reward, am I right?
I'm looking for Lab X16. The Barkeep told me that you might have info about its location.

We have been studying the emission in Lab X16 for a long time, but you won't get in there without special equipment. We've developed a psi-protection device that can help shield you from the emission, but needs some fine-tuning. If you could help us with that, I could give you a working prototype that you can use to get inside the laboratory.
OK.
Excellent, talk to Kruglov and get going. He's got everything you'll need.
No, I'm not up for this yet.
That's a real pity. So far we've been unable to send a measurement expedition of our own.
Yes, Sir? What might you be looking for?

We've long had an interest in Lab X16...or, rather, in the mechanism inside it that generates emissions which directly affects people's consciousness. I'm afraid I have to disappoint you: the place is impossible to penetrate without special psi-armor. The outcome is known in advance - even if you could evade the swarms of zombies that infest the laboratory entrance, you run the risk of becoming one of them. This is all very serious. However, we've designed a screening device to help shield the emission, but to fine-tune it we have to obtain additional measurements. If you help us with this task, we could probably provide you with a fully calibrated prototype for field testing.
Go on.

We have been studying the emission in Lab X16 for a long time, but you won't get in there without special equipment. We've developed a psi-protection device that can help shield you from the emission, but needs some fine-tuning. If you could help us with that, I could give you a working prototype that you can use to get inside the laboratory.
OK, I agree.
Excellent! Talk to Kruglov and get going. He is already equipped with the necessary gear.
OK.
OK, I agree.
Excellent! Talk to Semenov and get going. He's got everything you will need.
OK.
You don't understand, there's an emitter. No one has been able to come closer than half a kilometer - it makes a zombie out of anyone. Going there without a suit is just like suicide, get it?
Hmm. That changes things.
To hell with it, just tell me all you know.

OK, but don't say I didn't warn you. Vasiliev worked on the laboratory problem. About a week ago, he and stalker by the name of Ghost attempted to get inside the laboratory. After several hours we felt a shake and emissions stopped; after another hour, we got a signal from Vasiliev, it was coming from the swamp but then vanished. By the looks of things, Vasiliev is gone. Try to find his body: he had accurate information about the laboratory - where it is and how to get in. He might have also known how to turn off the emissions. The laboratory entrance is most likely hidden in the basement of one of the buildings in the power plant area.
There we go, great.
No.. right now I don't want to sign up for this.
That's too bad, a real pity... I don't know how or when we could carry out this measurement expedition on our own.

Thank you... mmm... Marked One, right? You helped save our associate Kruglov and in order to show my sincere appreciation I would like to present you with one of our working suits. It comes in very handy, you should know that...

You did a splendid job, Marked One! Now that the emissions are turned off, we will be able to order new expeditions and explore previously inaccessible territories. And also... from now on we will conduct a most favorable pricing policy toward you.
Thank you.
Yes, Marked One? What are you looking for?
You did an excellent job. If the measurements are correct, the prototype should provide you with maximum protection from emission.
Glad to hear that.

Now your path to the laboratory is clear... except that if the source of the emission isn't destroyed and doesn't lose its power, you may not have enough time to get back. So, my dear Sir, here is the deal. Our calculations have produced an estimated location of the source as well as the fact that it is under ground. With your permission, I have already marked the spot on your map.
How exactly does one get inside Lab X16? Where is the entrance?

Vasiliev was working on the lab issue. About a week ago he and a stalker called Ghost tried to get inside. A couple of hours later we felt a major tremor, and after another hour we picked up a signal from Vasiliev coming from the swamp, but it died away. And Vasiliev died away with it, it would seem. Try to find his corpse. He had the exact information on the lab and the way to get into it. There may even be info on deactivating that source of the emission. I've uploaded you all the data we have.
Ahem...It would be very interesting to take a look at these documents. So, you think Vasiliev has them?

Perhaps. At any rate, you must start by finding Vasiliev's body - that is the only chance of obtaining accurate information about the lab's location. The body of your colleague, Ghost, must be somewhere there as well. You know, it seemed to me like he knew a lot more about X16 than he admitted to us. Had he somehow survived... Well, it's no use holding on to that hope, of course.
OK, I'll try.
Why did he die? You were supposed to protect him!
Kruglov got killed by the zombies... I couldn't help it, there were too many of them.
Oh, man...how could this happen? How could this happen??! Damn it, everything is going wrong again. Now we'll have to call for more people... We've got enough problems as it is... Damn...
Listen... Kruglov is gone, but I'm alive. Give me the prototype. I will fight my way inside X16.

Here is a prototype, be careful with it. It's not calibrated properly, but that's your fault - you failed to save our colleague. The device won't provide maximum protection, but at least it will lower the emission's intensity. So, stalker, you'll have to move fast on your way to the source.
How does one get inside Lab X16? Where exactly is the entrance?

Vasiliev was working on the lab issue. About a week ago he and a stalker called Ghost tried to get inside. A couple of hours later we felt a major tremor, and after another hour we picked up a signal from Vasiliev coming from the swamp, but it died away. And Vasiliev died away with it, it would seem. Try to find his corpse. He had the exact information on the lab and the way to get into it. There may even be info on deactivating that source of the emission. I've uploaded you all the data we have.
Anything else?

You must start by finding Vasiliev's body - that is the only chance of obtaining accurate information about the lab's location. The body of your colleague, Ghost, must be somewhere there as well. You know, it seemed to me like he knew a lot more about X16 than he admitted to us. If he has survived somehow... Well, it's no use holding on to that hope, of course.
OK, I'll try.
Why did he die? Weren't you supposed to protect him?!
Semenov got shot by the zombies... I couldn't help it, there were too many of them.
Oh, man...how could this happen? How could this happen??! Damn it, everything is going wrong again. Now we'll have to call for more people... We've got enough problems as it is... Damn...
Listen... Semenov is gone, but I'm alive. Give me the prototype. I will fight my way inside X16.

Here is a prototype, be careful with it. It's not calibrated properly, but that's your fault - you failed to save our colleague. The device won't provide maximum protection, but at least it will lower the emission's intensity. So, stalker, you'll have to move fast on your way to the source.
How does one get inside Lab X16? Where exactly is the entrance?

Vasiliev was working on the lab issue. About a week ago he and a stalker called Ghost tried to get inside. A couple of hours later we felt a major tremor, and after another hour we picked up a signal from Vasiliev coming from the swamp, but it died away. And Vasiliev died away with it, it would seem. Try to find his corpse. He had the exact information on the lab and the way to get into it. There may even be info on deactivating that source of the emission. I've uploaded you all the data we have.
Ahem...It would be very interesting to take a look at these documents. So, you think Vasiliev has them?

Perhaps. At any rate, you must start by finding Vasiliev's body - that is the only chance of obtaining accurate information about the lab's location. The body of your colleague, Ghost, must be somewhere there as well. You know, it seemed to me like he knew a lot more about X16 than he admitted to us. Had he somehow survived... Well, it's no use holding on to that hope, of course.
OK, I'll try.
Yes, Marked One?
Yes, Marked One?
It's too bad that Kruglov died... Alas, nothing can bring him back. It's most important that you bring us the measurement data. Did you?
Yeah. Here.
Ok, let me adjust the prototype. Wait for me here.
Gotcha.
No.
Then get them, and quick! I cannot calibrate the prototype properly without them.
You did an excellent job. If the measurements are correct, the prototype should provide you with maximum protection from emission.
Can you be a little more clear?

Stalker, now you will be able to break through to the laboratory, but unless you turn off the emitter, you won't last long even with the psi-protection on. We've estimated an approximate location of the emitter; it is located in an underground facility. I have marked the spot on your map.
How do I get inside X16? Where exactly is the entrance?

Vasiliev was working on the lab issue. About a week ago he and a stalker called Ghost tried to get inside. A couple of hours later we felt a major tremor, and after another hour we picked up a signal from Vasiliev coming from the swamp, but it died away. And Vasiliev died away with it, it would seem. Try to find his corpse. He had the exact information on the lab and the way to get into it. There may even be info on deactivating that source of the emission. I've uploaded you all the data we have.
Ahem...It would be very interesting to take a look at these documents. So, you think Vasiliev has them?

Perhaps. At any rate, you must start by finding Vasiliev's body - that is the only chance of obtaining accurate information about the lab's location. The body of your colleague, Ghost, must be somewhere there as well. You know, it seemed to me like he knew a lot more about X16 than he admitted to us. Had he somehow survived... Well, it's no use holding on to that hope, of course.
OK, I'll try.
There's no time...
Yes, Marked One?
The professor asked me to take a trip to the measurement site.

Now you're talking business! Let's move out immediately. It was no use getting there alone, but with you it's different... I think we'll manage quickly - just make sure not to let those cadavers get too close. So, you ready?
Yeah.
You know what... Why don't you go first. You've got a whole lot of experience, unlike me. And those cadavers are starting to move again...
OK.
Wow! Marked One here on a personal visit! Finally you've made it to our parts. Talk to the Professor - he wants to thank you for rescuing me.
Later, later!
Hey, Marked One! How are things going?
Yes, Marked One?
Professor asked me to take a trip to the measurement site.

Now you're talking business! Let's move out immediately. It was no use getting there alone, but with you it's different... I think we'll manage quickly - just make sure not to let those cadavers too close to you. So, you ready?
Yeah.
You know what... Why don't you go first. You've got a whole lot of experience, unlike me. And those cadavers are starting to move again...
OK.
I'm sorry, I have no time for this right now.
Hey, Marked One! How's life?
Wait a little bit... We need to finish talking.
Wait! I'm not done taking measurements!
Yipe!. Ouch... argh..
You alive? C'mon, get up... Get up slowly. It's all over. It's behind us now.
Hey, Marked One. How are you?
Done! Pack the camera, time to get going!
Hey, Marked One! How's life?
Listen, Doc! I have a question!
Glad to hear it! Lately I've been pretty loaded with scientific work, but, nevertheless, not refuse to talk to a live person. Rarely are go.
Would you like a scientist to tell me one thing ... Hmm-m ... phenomenon?

Well, young man, tell me, what have you. Members of our laboratory, and in particular, and I was very interested in a variety of interesting phenomena, events ... We tried to understand them from a scientific point of view. It is possible that I can help you.
Tell me, do you know anything about the Time of Terror?

Oh-oh-oh ... Marked One, you touch on one of the most interesting and challenging aspects of my labors! But try to explain. \ NVremya Terror, as it is called a stalker, a psionic character. You see, with uncertain intervals in the exclusion zone so-called "conventional" emissions are accompanied by massive emissions of psy-radiation, causing people hallucinations and delusions. This radiation is different from that with which we deal here at Yantar. It is not as intense, but has the ability to travel considerable distances, almost without losing their properties. Unfortunately, the propagation of radiation is such that the exact location of the source is impossible. I can only say that it's pretty far away. \nThat's all I know about it.
Thanks, Doc!
